import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginService } from '../login.service'; import { GeneralApiService } from '../general-api.service'; import { first } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hostogram', templateUrl: './histogram.component.html', styleUrls: ['./histogram.component.scss'], }) export class HistogramComponent implements OnInit { token!: string; bloodPressure$!: number[]; isRawDisplay = true; constructor( private loginService: LoginService, private api: GeneralApiService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // this.token = this.loginService.LoginToken; // this.api.getUserBloodPressure(this.token) // .pipe(first()) // .subscribe({ // next: data => { // let what = data; // } // }) } switchPanel(isRaw: boolean){ this.isRawDisplay = isRaw; } }
